info.description:
Room to Relax
With two chaises built in on either side, there's plenty of room to stretch out - even for the busiest of homes.

Long Lasting
The fabric is durable and isn't as susceptible to fading as other materials. The pine frame and chrome legs makes it ideal for every day use.

Suit Yourself
Check out the Bartoli's sister collections - the Auguste and the Venturi - for different combinations of size and layout.
